Uses of Class
models.Item

Packages that use Item
Package Description
models  

  • Uses of Item in models

    Methods in models that return Item
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Item Trader.findItem​(java.lang.String name)
    this method finds the item in Trader.itemsBought array comparing the names of products
    Item Store.findProduct​(Item product)
    this method gets type Item as a parameter and search for that item in the store and returns it when it finds the item else returns null for item not found.
    Item[] GameManager.getBoughtList()
    this method a list of items that are bought by the trader
    Item[] GameManager.showProducts​(int categoryNumber)
    this method returns the list of items by category provided
    Methods in models that return types with arguments of type Item
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Trader.allBoughtItems()
    this method returns an Array containing all the bought items
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Trader.allSoldItems()
    this method return an Array containing all the sold items
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Trader.getBoughtList()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Island.getItemsFromStore()
    this method returns the products the store has on this island
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> GameManager.getProducts​(int categoryNumber)
    this method returns an array of items by category provided
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Store.getProducts()
    this method returns an Array of type Items containing all the products a store has.
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Store.getProducts​(java.lang.String category)
    this method returns an Array of type Items containing all the products of a specific category type
    Methods in models with parameters of type Item
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Ship.addInstallUpgrades​(Item newItem)
    add upgrades to the list which keeps history of installed upgrades
    void Store.addItem​(Item item, int index)
    this method adds items to the stores' invetory, it the item is already in the invetory it updates it's quantity
    void Store.addProducts​(Item item)
    this method add the products to the store based on the category
    void Island.addProductsToStore​(Item item)  
    java.lang.String Trader.addToItemsBought​(Item newItem, int quantity)
    After the purchase is completed, bought items are added to an array, if the item bought is an upgrad which is used straight away hence not added to the ItemBought array.
    void Trader.addToItemsSold​(Item product, int quantity)
    after the sale of an item is completed, the item is added to the itemSold array
    Item Store.findProduct​(Item product)
    this method gets type Item as a parameter and search for that item in the store and returns it when it finds the item else returns null for item not found.
    java.lang.String Store.makePurchase​(Item tempProduct, double coins, int orderedQuantity)
    this method processes a purchase of an item for trader, so store is selling the item.
    void Store.makeSale​(Item tempProduct, int sellQuantity)
    this method process the sale on an item of trader, so store is purchasing this item.
    java.lang.String Trader.purchase​(Item item, int quantity)
    this method completes the purchase
    java.lang.String Trader.sellItem​(Item item, int quantity)
    this methods is used to sell an item
    java.lang.String Trader.useUpgrades​(Item newItem, int quantity)
    upgrades are used straight away and are not re-sell able
